name: projects/wayfairy-retail/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/WF-BD-78901
categories: Furniture > Bedroom Furniture > Beds
title: Laurel Foundry Farmhouse Upholstered Panel Bed
description: Anchor your bedroom in rustic, yet refined style with this upholstered panel bed. Crafted from solid and manufactured wood with a distressed gray wash finish, this bed features a stately panel headboard and footboard. The headboard is upholstered in a neutral beige linen-blend fabric and showcases deep button tufting for a touch of texture. Requires a box spring for support. Assembly required.

name: projects/wayfairy-corp/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/WFRG8842
categories: Rugs > Area Rugs > Modern Rugs
title: Joss & Main Abstract Performance Gray/Ivory Area Rug
description: Add a touch of contemporary flair to your living space with this abstract area rug. Power-loomed in Turkey from stain-resistant polypropylene, it features a medium 0.4'' pile height, making it a perfect choice for high-traffic areas like the living room or entryway. The modern design, in a versatile gray and ivory palette, effortlessly complements a variety of decor styles. For best results, we recommend pairing with a rug pad (sold separately).

name: projects/wayfairy-corp/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/WF-SF-8801
categories: Furniture > Living Room Furniture > Sofas & Couches
title: Willa Arlo Interiors™ Alodie 84'' Upholstered Sofa
description: Anchor your living room in glamorous, contemporary style with this stunning statement sofa. Founded on a solid and manufactured wood frame, this sofa features a full back, track arms, and four tapered dowel legs in a gleaming gold finish. Enveloped in luxurious velvet upholstery, this sofa showcases vertical channel tufting, while its deep seat and back cushions are filled with foam and synthetic fiber for comfortable support. This sofa seats up to three people and has a weight capacity of 750 lbs.

name: projects/12345/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/WFCF1001
categories: Furniture > Living Room Furniture > Coffee Tables
title: Aveline Solid Wood Frame Coffee Table with Storage
description: Anchor your living room in classic, rustic style with this charming Aveline coffee table. Crafted from solid pine wood with a distressed natural oak finish, it showcases a rectangular silhouette with clean lines and four tapered square legs. The open lower shelf is perfect for stacking coffee table books or fanning out issues of your favorite magazines, while the spacious tabletop provides a perfect platform for displaying trays of appetizers and drinks at your next get-together.

Enveloped in a polyester blend upholstery, this sofa showcases a neutral hue that’s easy to pair with any color palette. name: projects/wayfairy-retail/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/WFCT9876
categories: Furniture > Living Room Furniture > Coffee Tables
title: Anderes Solid Wood Frame Coffee Table with Tray Top
description: Anchor your living room in rustic, coastal style with this handsome coffee table. Crafted from solid pine wood with a distressed finish, it features a clean-lined rectangular silhouette. The slatted lower shelf is perfect for fanning out issues of your favorite magazines or storing woven baskets filled with remotes and other essentials. The tray-style tabletop provides a secure surface for your morning coffee or evening cocktails, preventing spills from reaching your floor. Assembly is required.

name: projects/wayfairy-corp/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/0/products/WFKC7890
categories: Kitchen & Tabletop > Cookware > Pots & Pans Sets
title: Cuisinart Multiclad Pro Stainless Steel 12-Piece Cookware Set
description: Experience professional-grade cooking with the Cuisinart Multiclad Pro Stainless Steel 12-Piece Cookware Set. This elegant set features a triple-ply construction with a pure aluminum core for superior heat conductivity and even heat distribution. The stainless steel cooking surfaces do not discolor, react with food, or alter flavors. The set includes everything a home chef needs: 1.5- and 3-quart covered saucepans; 8- and 10-inch open skillets; a 3.5-quart covered sauté pan; an 8-quart covered stockpot; and a steamer insert with lid. Cool Grip handles stay cool on the stovetop and tight-fitting lids seal in moisture and nutrients.

name: projects/wayfairy-corp/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/BDS78901
categories: Furniture > Bedroom Furniture > Beds
title: Joss & Main™ Aviana Upholstered Low Profile Platform Bed
description: Anchor your bedroom in a clean, contemporary style with the Aviana Platform Bed. The headboard showcases deep button tufting for a touch of tailored elegance. A series of wooden slats accommodate your mattress without the need for a bulky box spring, creating a sleek and modern silhouette. Available in multiple sizes and colors to perfectly match your decor.

sizes: Overall: 34.5'' H x 103.5'' W x 65'' D

name: projects/wayfairy-dev/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/0/products/WFPPS78901
categories: Kitchen & Tabletop > Cookware > Pots & Pans Sets
title: Sand & Stable™ 12-Piece Ceramic Non-Stick Cookware Set with Lids
description: Elevate your culinary experience with this comprehensive 12-piece cookware set, designed for both style and function. Featuring a durable ceramic non-stick coating, this set allows for healthier cooking with less oil and ensures an effortless cleanup. The heavy-gauge aluminum construction provides quick and even heating, while the soft-touch handles stay cool for comfortable handling. This set includes essential pots, pans, and utensils, making it a perfect starter kit or upgrade for any home chef. The tempered glass lids allow you to monitor your cooking without losing heat or moisture.

name: projects/wayfairy-retail/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/WFY-PS-54321
categories: Outdoor > Outdoor Seating > Patio Sofas
title: Sand & Stable™ Calliope 5-Person Wicker Outdoor Sectional with Cushions
description: Create the perfect outdoor oasis with our Calliope sectional. This 5-piece set is crafted from all-weather wicker over a durable, rust-resistant steel frame. The deep-seating design features plush, foam-filled cushions wrapped in fade- and water-resistant polyester fabric. The modular design allows for multiple configurations to fit your space. Includes two corner chairs, one armless chair, an ottoman, and a coffee table with a tempered glass top.

name: projects/wayfairy-corp/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/WFHFL-HWF-21045

title: Artisan Mills European Oak 7.5'' Wide Wire Brushed Hardwood Flooring
description: Transform your space with the timeless elegance of Artisan Mills European Oak hardwood flooring. Each plank is 7.5 inches wide and features a wire-brushed texture that enhances the natural grain of the wood. Finished with a durable matte lacquer, this flooring is designed to withstand the rigors of daily life while maintaining its sophisticated appeal. Suitable for installation on any level of your home, it offers both beauty and durability. Sold by the case, covering 31.09 sq. ft.

name: projects/wayfairy-corp/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/WF-SOF-88741

title: Sand & Stable™ Audrey 84'' Upholstered Sofa with Reversible Cushions
description: Anchor your living room in timeless, traditional style with the Audrey Sofa. Crafted with a solid and engineered wood frame, this sofa is upholstered in a durable, pet-friendly polyester blend fabric. It features rolled arms, a camelback silhouette, and welted trim for a classic look. The reversible seat and back cushions are filled with foam and supported by sinuous springs to resist sagging over time. Plus, two included toss pillows add a touch of extra comfort and style. categories: Baby & Kids > Nursery Furniture > Cribs
title: Graco Solano 4-in-1 Convertible Crib with Drawer
description: The Graco Solano 4-in-1 Convertible Crib with Drawer is the perfect choice for any nursery. It features a three-position adjustable mattress support base and converts to a toddler bed, daybed, and full-size bed. A large under-crib drawer provides ample storage for your baby's belongings. Constructed with high-quality pine wood and composites, this crib is built to last and is JPMA certified.
